author: Jon Santer
description: Depending on your coffee liqueur, this can be a tad on the dry side so I've added a splash of sugar. Hence, according to your own tastes, you may want to omit/or increase the sugar, and if adding sugar then also consider using muscovado or demerara sugar rather than white sugar syrup.
name: Revolver
recipeIngredient: 2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix) (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
